摺る: (する) - to print; to color or pattern fabric using a wooden mold
摺ガラス: (すりガラス) - ground glass; frosted glass
摺動: (しゅうどう) - sliding or moving along a smooth surface with continuous contact on that surface
摺染: (すりぞめ) - method of patterning fabric by pounding on leaves (or flowers, etc.) placed on it, or by rubbing in dye made from these materials; coloring fabric by placing a paper stencil over it and brushing on the dye/fabric colored in such a manner
摺硝子: (すりガラス) - ground glass; frosted glass
摺箔: (すりはく) - impressed (glued) gold or silver foil on traditional Japanese fabric; type of noh costume
摺足: (すりあし) - sliding feet/shuffling (one's feet); {sumo} moving legs forward with feet never leaving the ground (exercise)
摺込染: (すりこみぞめ) - coloring fabric by placing a paper stencil over it and brushing on the dye; fabric colored in such a manner
撃たれる: (うたれる) - to be struck; to be beaten
撃ちまくる: (うちまくる) - to pound away; to hit at random; to hit ceaselessly
撃ち合い: (うちあい) - gunfight; exchange of shots; firefight
撃ち合う: (うちあう) - to exchange gunfire; to exchange shots
撃ち手: (うちて) - shooter; (打ち手, 打手 only) drummer (taiko, etc.)
撃ち払う: (うちはらう) - to drive someone off with gunfire
撃ち抜く: (うちぬく) - to shoot out (lights, window, etc.)
撃ち損なう: (うちそこなう) - to fail to hit; to miss
撃ち止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
撃ち殺す: (うちころす) - to shoot to death
撃ち破る: (うちやぶる) - to break; to smash; to defeat; to destroy; to eliminate
撃ち落す: (うちおとす) - to knock down; to shoot down; to lop off
撃ち落とす: (うちおとす) - to knock down; to shoot down; to lop off
撃ち込む: (うちこむ) - to fire into (e.g. a crowd); to launch (e.g. missiles); to lob (e.g. grenades)
撃つ: (うつ) - (usu. 撃つ) to shoot (at); to attack/to defeat/to destroy/to avenge
撃合い: (うちあい) - gunfight; exchange of shots; firefight
撃壌: (げきじょう) - to stamp on the ground rhythmically while singing; ancient Chinese game of wooden clog throwing
撃手: (うちて) - shooter; (打ち手, 打手 only) drummer (taiko, etc.)
撃払う: (うちはらう) - to drive someone off with gunfire
撃攘: (げきじょう) - repulse (e.g. enemy); repelling; driving off
撃止める: (うちとめる) - (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) to hammer into place; (打ち止める, 打ち留める, 打止める, 打留める only) (also うちどめる) to end (a performance); (撃ち止める refers esp. to a gun, and 討ち止める to a blade) to kill/to slay/to shoot dead/to cut down
撃殺す: (うちころす) - to shoot to death
撃沈: (げきちん) - sending a ship to the bottom/sinking (a ship); to sink a ship
撃落す: (うちおとす) - to knock down; to shoot down; to lop off
撃退: (げきたい) - repulse; repel (i.e. the enemy)
撃鉄: (げきてつ) - percussion hammer; firing hammer; cocking piece
撒き散らす: (まきちらす) - to scatter; to spread
撒き菱: (まきびし) - caltrop (spiked device scattered to maim infantry and horses); calthrop; caltrap
撒き餌: (まきえ) - scattered animal feed; ground bait
撒く: (まく) - to scatter/to sprinkle/to strew; to distribute (handbills, etc.)/to spread (rumours, etc.); to give the slip/to throw off/to shake off/to lose
撒水: (さっすい) - sprinkling water over; irrigating
撒菱: (まきびし) - caltrop (spiked device scattered to maim infantry and horses); calthrop; caltrap
撓: (とう) - Dobra, interpenetração do espírito entre o poeta e a natureza em um haicai
撓う: (しなう) - to bend/to warp/to yield; to be supple (e.g. bamboo, body)/to be flexible/to be pliant
撓める: (たわめる) - to bend (a piece of wood, etc.); to bow
撓やか: (たわやか) - flexible; pliant; pliable; supple; bendy
撓る: (しわる) - to bend/to warp/to yield; to be supple (e.g. bamboo, body)/to be flexible/to be pliant
撓わ: (たわわ) - (of a branch heavily laden with fruit, etc.) drooping; bending
撓垂れ掛かる: (しなだれかかる) - to lean coquettishly against; to snuggle into; to nestle into
撚り合せる: (よりあわせる) - to intertwine; to twist together
撚り合わせる: (よりあわせる) - to intertwine; to twist together
撚り糸: (よりいと) - twisting (thread, etc.); twisted yarn; twisted thread; twine
撚糸: (ねんし) - twisted thread or yarn; twining of thread or yarn
撞く: (つく) - to prick/to stab; to poke/to prod/to push/to thrust/to nudge/to hit/to strike; to use (a cane)/to prop oneself up with/to press against (the floor, etc.); to attack; to brave (the rain, etc.)
撞木反り: (しゅもくぞり) - {sumo} bell hammer backwards body drop
撤収: (tesshuu) - removal (ex. de um prédio), dismantling (e.g. a tent), striking (e.g. a stage set); withdrawal (of troops), evacuation, retreating
撤回: (てっかい) - withdrawal; retraction; revocation; repeal
撤廃: (てっぱい) - annulment; abolition; repeal; rescission
撤頭徹尾: (てっとうてつび) - (yoji) thoroughly; through and through
撥: (はつ) - Brush Up , plectrum, pick; drumstick for Japanese drums (ex.: taiko)
撥ね: (はね) - (a) jump; splashes (usu. of mud); (often 撥ね) upward turn at the bottom (e.g. of a vertical stroke of a kanji or of a hairdo); close (e.g. of a theatrical performance)/breakup
撥ねかす: (はねかす) - to splash; to splatter
撥ねつける: (はねつける) - to repel; to spurn
撥ねる: (はねる) - to hit (e.g. to have a car hit someone)/to run into; to reject/to deny/to refuse; to eliminate/to exclude/to leave out; to flip/to splash/to splatter; (esp. 刎ねる) to decapitate/to behead; to jump up; to point or curl up (e.g. ends of hair)
撥ね上げる: (はねあげる) - to splash; to raise
撥ね上げ戸: (はねあげど) - trapdoor; trap door; flap door
撥ね付ける: (はねつける) - to repel; to spurn
